contentrichtext.text: There are 59 [[BBC Radio]] stations, as listed below. They are available on either analogue, digital and/or internet radio. ==National radio stations== Analogue stations are in Bold text. *'''[[BBC Radio 1]]''' – popular music aimed at a young audience *[[BBC Radio 1Xtra]] – hip hop, garage, RnB, drum & bass & dancehall, aimed at a young audience *'''[[BBC Radio 2]]''' – adult-oriented popular music *'''[[BBC Radio 3]]''' – classical, jazz and world music, culture, drama *'''[[BBC Radio 4]]''' – spoken-word programmes *[[BBC Radio 4 Extra]] – archive comedy, drama and children's programming *'''[[BBC Radio 5 Live]]''' – news and sport *[[BBC Radio 5 Live Sports Extra]]- news and sport *[[BBC Radio 6 Music]] – rock, funk, alternative *'''[[BBC Asian Network]]''' – Indian and British content aimed at [[British Asian]]s (some areas on analogue, nationwide on digital) ==Regional radio stations== *[[BBC Radio Scotland]] *[[BBC Radio nan Gàidheal]] – Scottish Gaelic language *[[BBC Radio Shetland]] – Scotland (Shetland) *[[BBC Radio Orkney]] – Scotland (Orkney) *[[BBC Radio Wales]] *[[BBC Radio Cymru]] – Welsh language *[[BBC Radio Ulster]] – Northern Ireland *[[BBC Radio Foyle]] – Northern Ireland (Londonderry) ==English local radio stations== ===East=== *[[BBC Essex]] *[[BBC Radio Cambridgeshire]] *[[BBC Radio Norfolk]] *[[BBC Radio Northampton]] *[[BBC Radio Suffolk]] *[[BBC Three Counties Radio]] ===East Midlands=== *[[BBC Lincolnshire]] *[[BBC Radio Derby]] *[[BBC Radio Leicester]] *[[BBC Radio Nottingham]] ===London=== *[[BBC London 94.9]] ===North=== *[[BBC Radio Humberside]] *[[BBC Radio Leeds]] *[[BBC Radio Sheffield]] *[[BBC Radio York]] ===North East & Cumbria=== *[[BBC Newcastle]] *[[BBC Tees]] *[[BBC Radio Cumbria]] ===North West=== *[[BBC Radio Lancashire]] *[[BBC Radio Manchester]] *[[BBC Radio Merseyside]] ===South=== *[[BBC Oxford]] *[[BBC Radio Berkshire]] *[[BBC Radio Solent]] ===South East=== *[[BBC Radio Kent]] *[[BBC Surrey]] *[[BBC Sussex]] ===South West=== *[[BBC Guernsey]] *[[BBC Radio Cornwall]] *[[BBC Radio Devon]] *[[BBC Radio Jersey]] ===West=== *[[BBC Radio Bristol]] *[[BBC Radio Gloucestershire]] *[[BBC Somerset]] *[[BBC Wiltshire]] ===West Midlands=== *[[BBC Coventry & Warwickshire]] *[[BBC Hereford & Worcester]] *[[BBC Radio Shropshire]] *[[BBC Radio Stoke]] *[[BBC WM]] ==BBC international radio stations== *[[BBC World Service]] ==See also== *[[BBC Local Radio]]
